thread.section_title: Hallowood Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hallowood Furniture | www.hallowood.co.uk
thread.title: Gill

author: Gill
title: Gill
text:
My partner has bought a number of lovely, and very good value items from Hallowood. I order a bookcase which came promptly but it had a small flaw where a screw had been put in at the wrong place a lifted the veneer on the bookcase shelf slightly. I called soon after it was delivered and although I could have asked for a replacement, the manager offered a small refund to compensate.
The furniture is usually excellent and very good value for money. After sales service 5*
